body_html: I'm having the same issue. I can get tensorflow to install from source without GPU support enabled. But with GPU support, on CentOS 6.4, it can't find libpython.so.1.0. Python is installed in a non-standard location. Suggestions would be welcome.
body_text: I'm having the same issue.  I can get tensorflow to install from source without GPU support enabled.  But with GPU support, on CentOS 6.4, it can't find libpython.so.1.0.  Python is installed in a non-standard location.  Suggestions would be welcome.
